channel.title: Harmony From The Heart

channel.desc: The iciest of hearts melt when a preppy avalanche expert and a no-nonsense rescue ranger are stationed at the same mountain park.

channel.title: Never Too Late To Celebrate
channel.desc: Career-focused Camila's anxiety over her 30th birthday is swayed by Spanish teacher Javi, who convinces her to celebrate with a quincea?era-themed party.
